simplified_text:
Blake Masters wrote really detailed class notes that got shared all over, not just at his school. In his book, Zero to One, I helped him update those notes so more people could read them. The future shouldnâ€™t just be about what happens at Stanford, in college, or in Silicon Valley.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Blake Masters created detailed class notes that became popular. I helped him revise them for more readers, emphasizing that the future isn't limited to specific places like Stanford or Silicon Valley.
